page.title: 11SERVICES
page.content:
Despite the fact that householders pay rates, all of the domestic services are provided by the estate.
WATER Water for each household is supplied from one of the naturally occurring springs on the hillside. One spring is utilised on Sanday, four on Canna. Water can be in very short supply during the summer and occasionally the springs dry up altogether. The NTS are trying to improve the water supply by increasing the volume of the holding tanks and replacing the old asbestos supply pipes with polythene pipe. If more houses are built there is still likely to be a problem though.
